rows.label: tlk42100152_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmph! It seems the Superbian research lab
couldn't manage to have a conversation with me
in the end.

rows.label: tlk42100152_05_msg0002
rows.name:
It's not like I'm disappointed or anything!
It was just too predictable and boring!

rows.label: tlk42100152_05_msg0003
rows.name:
...But talking with you,
I've started to think that conversations with
humans aren't so bad after all.

rows.label: tlk42100152_05_msg0004
rows.name:
I don't like being called a pet fox until the very end,
but I don't dislike you.
